JOHN RICHARD SCHUMACHER

I am a Cognitive Psychology Doctoral Candidate at Texas Tech University. I have expertise in experimental research and inferential statistical modeling.

This website contains various statistical tools (i.e., excel calculators, modified R functions, learning guides) that may be of use to some. All work is either my own or modified work that I have cited. These tools were originally created for teaching and research purposes. I tend only to develop calculators and modify code as is needed for my work, and I try not to recreate the wheel. Due to this, these tools tend to serve rarer statistical tasks than the ones most often employed.
